Instructions

We are interested in learning about how people make decisions about time. In this study, you are going to solve a series of problems about scheduling events. To help you solve the problems, we are going to give you a variety of graphs and diagrams. You are going to complete all of the activities on this computer.
Acme Factory [20 minutes]
Final Survey [5 minutes]
Complete a demographic survey and feedback on your experience.

To ensure accurate results, please:

  • DO read all instructions carefully
  • DO NOT close this browser window
  • DO NOT try to return to a previous page
  • DO NOT use the back button on the mouse or web browser

If you have questions at any time, please raise your hand and the experimenter will assist you.
